## Fetch, filter and sort notion tasks
Currently tasks are filtered by having a deadline and sorted by this

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## Generate HTML template per task
Generate a template for each task. It displays the headline and some prperties.
You can adjust the template here to show more or less information about each task.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content:
## Create groups of tasks to "overdue" and "due to"
This is used to group the tasks and display them accordingly in the final html email template.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content:
## Create html email template
Here the whole html email template is set up.
Styles are applied and some sugar around list of tasks are shown.
You may change this to your design and even replace the logo.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

## Send email and push notification
In the Pushover node you need to place you User Key to receive push notifications.
Use the Pushover docs to read more about how to setup this service.

- You need to create a Pushover account in order to receive push notifications via this service

nodes.name: Sticky Note8

parameters.content:
## Adjustment needed
In order to not receive "Done" or "Closed" items from your notion database you need to add some filters in this Notion node.

E.g. you could add "Status" is not equal to "Closed", to not get closed items.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Manualtrigger Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Manualtrigger Workflow. This workflow integrates 14 different services: filter, stickyNote, scheduleTrigger, merge, pushover. It contains 28 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 28
- **Node Types**: 14
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **Notion**: notion
- **Sort by closest deadline**: sort
- **Filter for deadline**: filter
- **Send Email**: emailSend
- **HTML**: html
- **Aggregate due to tasks**: aggregate
- **Aggregate overdue tasks**: aggregate
- **Pushover**: pushover
- **Schedule Trigger**: scheduleTrigger
- ... and 18 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
